tweet: As we continue to monitor Hurricane Dorian please exercise caution — especially if you are headed to the beach this weekend.  The latest briefing for Southeastern North Carolina can be found below. #NC07 https://twitter.com/NWSWilmingtonNC/status/1167408702841704448 …

Joined local officials from #NC07 coastal communities to discuss hurricane recovery, beach renourishment & how we can work together at all levels of government to mitigate & become more resilient to disasters. pic.twitter.com/HTZw9Op3Xz

The no-wake zone is critical to preserve the Southport Marina & to enhance safety for all in the Intracoastal Waterway – thank you to the U.S. Army Corps & the U.S. Coast Guard for taking action to address the unique needs of our coastal communities. #NC07 https://stateportpilot.com/news/article_479c8198-c9cf-11e9-a4e8-b7c078750920.html …
Joined Mayor Joe Scott to talk with seniors in Mt. Olive about how we can best protect Medicare and Social Security. #NC07 pic.twitter.com/Qq0hx9QtPg
It was great joining the Benson Chamber of Commerce to meet with local leaders and discuss issues impacting #NC07 families, the agriculture community & our economy. pic.twitter.com/G5jrMth9oi

This #PurpleHeartDay we pay tribute to the brave heroes of our Armed Forces who have been killed or wounded in defense of our nation.  We will always honor your service & sacrifice. pic.twitter.com/e6QEtwwNgP
Happy Birthday to the @uscoastguard! Thank you to all the Coast Guard men and women – especially those from & serving in North Carolina – for your service & sacrifice. pic.twitter.com/QJ2MQe11ua
